name: wayn-group.mgm.skill
description:
This package contain performant and disigner friendly skill system.
It allow the definition of custom effects that can be composed to form any kind of skill.
Effectact can range from the simple direct effect (damage,pushback,..) to the AOE and/or over time effects.

samples.description: This sample demonstrate how to implement a simple direct damage effect and using it in a skill.
